name: Pidgeon-Man
description:
PIDGEON-MAN, cleanser of flying pests.
In this Game (which is sadly not finished) you play an Anti-Hero wanting to rid the city of its flying pests with their own favorite food.

Make your way Through the level trying to find all 10 Pidgeons and get them out of the city!

Controls: WASD - Movement
                      Space   -  Jump
                      Left Click - Shoot

                      Shift - Glide

Credits:

Stone Brick Wall: http://pixelartmaker.com/art/31b17490e7ef5d8
Music: YouTube Audio-Mediathek / Devious Little Smile - Godmode
The rest of the Code, Art and Sound was made by us.
